alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 3:17AM PDT until April 05 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
